Other OCI: other comprehensive income loss net of tax portion attributable to parent
Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax period increase decrease

Stock-Based Compensation: adjustments to additional paid in capital sharebased compensation requisite service period recognition value
Total Stock Issuance Value: stock issued during period value treasury stock reissued

Stock Repurchases: treasury stock value acquired cost method
Tax Effects from Stock Compensation: adjustments to additional paid in capital tax effect from share based compensation
__unmapped__: stock issued during period shares treasury stock reissued
